SEARCH
Module org.microbean.bean
Package org.microbean.bean

Interface AutoCloseableRegistry

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAutoCloseableRegistry, DefaultCreation
public interface AutoCloseableRegistry extends AutoCloseable, Cloneable
A Cloneable reigstry of AutoCloseable instances that itself is AutoCloseable.

Closing an AutoCloseableRegistry closes its registrants.

Author:
Laird Nelson
See Also:
  • register(AutoCloseable)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    AutoCloseableRegistry
    clone()
    Returns a new AutoCloseableRegistry instance that is not closed and has no register(AutoCloseable) registrations.
    void
    close()
    Closes this AutoCloseableRegistry and closes its registrants.
    boolean
    closed()
    Returns true if and only if this AutoCloseableRegistry has been closed.
    boolean
    register(AutoCloseable c)
    If this AutoCloseableRegistry is not closed, and if the supplied AutoCloseable has not yet been registered, registers it such that it will be closed when this AutoCloseableRegistry is closed, and returns true.

  • Method Details

    • clone

      AutoCloseableRegistry clone()
      Returns a new AutoCloseableRegistry instance that is not closed and has no register(AutoCloseable) registrations.

      The new instance will be registered with this AutoCloseableRegistry if this AutoCloseableRegistry is not closed.

      Returns:
      a new AutoCloseableRegistry
      See Also:
      • Cloneable
      • closed()
      • register(AutoCloseable)
      Idempotency:
      All invocations of implementations of this method must return new, distinct AutoCloseable instances.
      Nullability:
      Implementations of this method must not return null.
      Thread Safety:
      Implementations of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • close

      void close()
      Closes this AutoCloseableRegistry and closes its registrants.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Idempotency:
      Implementations of this method must be idempotent.
      Thread Safety:
      Implementations of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • closed

      boolean closed()
      Returns true if and only if this AutoCloseableRegistry has been closed.
      Returns:
      true if and only if this AutoCloseableRegistry has been closed
      Idempotency:
      Implementations of this method must be idempotent.
      Thread Safety:
      Implementations of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • register

      boolean register(AutoCloseable c)
      If this AutoCloseableRegistry is not closed, and if the supplied AutoCloseable has not yet been registered, registers it such that it will be closed when this AutoCloseableRegistry is closed, and returns true.

      This method takes no action and returns false in all other cases.

      Parameters:
      c - the AutoCloseable to register; must not be null
      Returns:
      true if and only if this AutoCloseableRegistry is not closed and the supplied AutoCloseable is not already registered and registration completed successfully; false in all other cases
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if c is null
